message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your offer, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $160. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $145. Would you be willing to sell the product to me at that price?
I understand that you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise again. I'll sell the product to you for $155. This is as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $150. Would you be willing to sell the product to me at that price?
